item.description:
We had sooo much fun at the Princeton Station that we are going back!!! Join us at 8 for munch and chat. Get to know other members of the group, we have had lots laughs and met some really great singles. The band starts around 9 and the place is hoppin' so boogie on down and don't forget to RSVP so we can try to get enough tables and chairs.
Rampage Trio is a high energy blues/rock band.
cdbaby.com/rampagetrio

"Longtime gig veterans Brian Owens on vocals & guitar, Eric Yanaway on bass guitar and Kevin "KC" Crowley on vocals & drums are stompin' around New England every weekend. The band has played shows with Otis Clay, Buckwheat Zydeco, Edgar Winter, Joe Bonamassa, Mountain, Roomful of Blues, Sleepy LaBeef and many other great rock & roll bands. Come out and see them live and find out why they're one of the hottest acts on the circuit! Big noise from three big cats!"

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing and Music - Rampage Trio / Princeton Station Chelmsford
